attributes.description: VARIOUS COLOURS AVAILABLE THIS IS THE MOST EXCITING PRODUCT TO HIT THE SA MARKET IN A VERY LONG TIME. In my opinion, the Chinese manufacturers are now where the Koreans were 10 years ago when they launched the new generation KIA SPORTAGE and HYUNDAI IX35. They were making a good quality product at an affordable price. The Koreans are still making a good product but the price is no longer so affordable with their entrylevel S.U.Vs selling for over R400 000. Enter the BAIC X25. It is just such a cool S.U.V. ALL THE MODERN FEATURES AND LUXURIES INCLUDING TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT WITH FULLY INTEGRATED SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY. Just such a beautiful looking S.U.V. The lines are just gorgeous Make no mistake, the build quality and overall feel of this vehicle are also brilliant. THE 11 BILLION WAS SPENT ON A STATEOFTHEART PRODUCTION PLANT IN PE. THIS MEANS THAT THIS MANUFACTURER IS HERE TO STAY. The car comes with a 5 YEAR120 000 KM factory warranty which equals 100 peace of mind motoring We have a fully accredited BAIC workshop on site. Must be seen and driven to be appreciated. For all your parts and maintenance needs. IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A COOLER OR BETTER VALUE BLACK LISTED WE CAN ASSIST Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security
